FuncDef: This command clears the stored MAC addresses in the CFMlearned-remote-macaddress table. A valid MAC address must exist in thelearned-remote-mactable for a successful PDU generation when that test uses theremote-mepidmep-idoption in place of amac-address.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the MD index. Values-1 to 4294967295.
Specifies the MA index. Values-1 to 4294967295.
Specifies the local MEP ID. Values-1 to 8191.
Specifies the remote MEP ID. Values-1 to 8191.
